# Change Log
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [0.0.9] - 2017-12-17

### Changed
- added `plus4` field for ZIP+4 code

## [0.0.8] - 2017-08-15

### Changed
- added `Row` street type

## [0.0.7] - 2017-07-29

### Changed
- lazy init to avoid slow loading

## [0.0.6] - 2016-09-27

### Changed
- XRegExp updated to 3.1.1
- Removed XRegExp Addons

## [0.0.5] - 2015-08-18
### Changed
- Strict Mode

## [0.0.4] - 2014-12-12
### Changed
- Removed underscore dependency
- Added browserify

## [0.0.3] - 2014-12-12
### Changed
- Added tests 
- Update README

## [0.0.2] - 2014-12-12
- Published to NPM
